sub_topic: Probability of winning a game of chance
message_1: A student plays a game where they must roll a standard six-sided die and guess the number that will come up. The student wins the game if the number they guessed matches the number on the die. What is the probability that the student wins the game on their first guess?
message_2: The probability of the student winning the game on their first guess is 1/6, as there is one correct number out of six possible outcomes on a standard six-sided die.
